titles.title: For the relief of Earl B. Chappell, Jr.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Judiciary.
Referred to the Subcommittee on Administrative Law and Governmental Relations.

bill.summary: 3/29/1993--Introduced. Directs the Secretary of the Treasury to pay a specified sum to a named individual in full satisfaction of any claim against the United States for interest on the amount erroneously deducted from backpay awarded to such individual.
